original: 18.23. Upādānagocchakādi, Hetuduka🔽Upādānaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: upādānam hetum dhammam paṭicca no upādānaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
translated: In the order of the True Idea and in the reverse order, and in the section on the two-and-a-half-factored table of contents🔽With the bases for consciousness as first member, etc., and with cause as first member🔽With a causally-determined idea that is a footing for assuming as condition there arises an idea that is not causally-determined and is not a footing for assuming, in the form of a condition by cause. …

original: Kilesaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: kilesam hetum dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri saṅkhitta
translated: With a defilement as first member, etc. …
